sentences.en: Coma Guy: Uh, a little woozy, but basically okay.
sentences.cn: 昏迷男人: 嗯, 有点虚弱, 不过基本正常.

sentences.en: Giving blood makes me feel really woozy.
sentences.cn: 献血后我会觉得头晕目眩。

sentences.en: Has anything like that ever happened to you? Have you ever, had been woozy at altitude?
sentences.cn: 你曾经遇到过这种情况 吗 ?你曾经在高海拔上眩晕 吗 ?

sentences.en: He was woozy from a blow on the head.
sentences.cn: 他被当头一击,打得晕头转向.

sentences.en: I couldn't stand on my left leg and my head was woozy from hitting the ground.
sentences.cn: 我的左腿不能站立,由于与地面碰撞,头晕目眩.

sentences.en: I feel dizzy and woozy , and my heart is racing.
sentences.cn: 我觉得头昏眼花 、 心跳加速.

sentences.en: I felt woozy in my stomach.
I was dizzy and woozy , and my heart was racing.
sentences.cn: 我觉得头昏眼花的而且心跳加速.

sentences.en: The condensation shorts the circuits to your brain, and you get all woozy.
sentences.cn: 湿气凝结导致大脑短路, 你开始头昏脑胀.

words.tran_cn: 虚弱的，微醉的；头昏眼花的

trans.tran_cn: <非正>头昏眼花的，眩晕的，糊里糊涂的，轻度恶心的
